content:
Hallo allerseits,

Mein Name ist Teresa Klatzer von der Black Tusk GmbH.
Wir arbeiten gerade an der Konzeption für ein FHIR Frontend, die das Anbinden und Verwalten eines FHIR Servers erleichtern soll.

Ich suche InterviewpartnerInnen, die mit mir ca. 30 Minuten über ihre Problemstellungen sprechen möchten. Es sollen sich jene Personen angesprochen fühlen, die gerade nach einer solchen Lösung suchen.

Ich freue mich auf eure Rückmeldungen, danke!

LG Teresa

Welcome to this forum - please note however that this forum is strictly product and vendor neutral, and as such solicitations such as these are frowned upon. You're welcome to discuss the architecture of, open issues related to, or other aspects of your product, but please refrain from using a sales approach. I'm sure you understand..

@René Spronk Hi Rene,
my posting was not intended as a sales approach, but I see your point that it can be understood as such.
I am searching for an open discussion about this topic, so you suggest posting my questions directly to the forum?

To me it appeared as a sales approach, which is the kind of impression we should try and avoid.. asking your questions (I guess) would be most helpful, both to you, as well as to the readers of a forum like this.
